DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 2 , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled study TAT4 Gel reduction moderate severe nasolabial fold .
DOC.brief_title: Phase 2 Study TAT4 Gel Reduction Nasolabial Folds
DOC.criteria: Moderate severe , bilateral nasolabial fold Must understand provide inform consent Pregnant lactate woman History skin hypersensitivity atopic dermatitis Any illness disease , investigator 's opinion , would make trial participation inadvisable
